title: Running Form
content: A proper running form is very effective for enhancing the performance which can also prevent injuries when done correctly.

title: Avoid Overstriding
content: Overstriding kills the running performance by consuming more energy and as well as leading to injury. Keep your stride length natural.

title: Conversational Pace or Easy Pace
content: Almost 80% of your weeks runs should be easy runs. Easy runs are where you are able to hold a conversation while run.

title: Interval Run or Threshold Run
content: Interval runs or fartlek run are short reps with hard effort with short rest inbetween. Threshold runs are long 30 to 60 mins non stop running at 1 minute to 1 minute 30 seconds faster than your easy pace. These runs you must never miss out if you need to enhance your performance.

title: Landing your foot lighter on ground
content: Impact of landing your foot on ground is also the most important thing to keep note while running. The lighter you try to land your foot on the ground will decrease the risk of injury ,save energy and improve your performance

title: Workout to gain strength
content: Training your body with weight or body weight can massively improve your performance. There are various types of training methods(bodyweight training, weight training, mobility training, flexibility training, plyometric training). Do these training atleast twice a week to prevent injuries.

title: Nutrition
content: Avoid junk, drink atleast 3 litres of water, consume electrolytes while or after running, Nuts and veggies are very good for your gut and overall health.

title: Recovery
content: Sleep atleast 7 to 8 hrs for your body to recover. Take ice bath or do massages for faster recovery.
